api_key_heroku.description: Get your API key from https://dashboard.heroku.com/account

api_id.description: Get your own Telegram API key from https://my.telegram.org/apps

api_hash.description: Get your own Telegram API hash from https://my.telegram.org/apps

redis_endpoint.description: Get your own free 30 MB databse from https://redislabs.com/

redis_password.description: Get your own free 30 MB databse from https://redislabs.com/

console_logger_level.description: Logging level to use for Heroku logs.

logger_group_id.description: The ID of a group if you want the userbot to log everything.

pm_permit.description: Set this to 'True' to enable PMPermit feature.

user.description: Your github username/email to access private repos.

token.description: Your github token to access private repos. Get it from https://github.com/settings/tokens/new and enable repo.

repos.description: A list of the repos you want to add. eg: user/repo, user1/repo1

userbot_prefix.description: If you want to use one specific prefix. Set one.

default_sticker_pack.description: Default sticker pack to add the new stickers in.

default_animated_sticker_pack.description: Default animated sticker pack to add the new stickers in.

self_destruct_msg.description: Set this to 'False' to disable auto-deletion of userbot's toast messages.

api_key_removebg.description: Get your API key from https://remove.bg/
